question: Which nation was ruled by the Xia-Qin-Han-Tang-Song dynasties in its ancient period?
explanation: Xia, Qin, Han, Tang and Song dynasties were the dynasties that ruled ancient China from 2070 BC to 1279 AD. Xia dynasty is considered as the first dynasty of ancient China that ruled from 2070 BC to 1600 BC. Qin dynasty ruled China from 221 BC to 207 BC. Han dynasty ruled China from 202 BC to 220 AD. Tang dynasty ruled China from 618 AD to 907 AD and Song dynasty ruled China from 960 AD to 1279 AD.
